sentences.en: After their long argument the two brothers have at last buried the hatchet.
sentences.cn: 长期争吵之后,兄弟俩终于和解了.

sentences.en: After their long argument the two brothers have at last the hatchet.
sentences.cn: 长期争吵之后,兄弟俩终于“和解”了.

sentences.en: All right! Let's bury the hatchet and be friends.
sentences.cn: 好了, 让我们捐弃前嫌,结为朋友.

sentences.en: As far as we could see Alice never buried the hatchet.
sentences.cn: 我们认为,艾丽斯这号人至死也不会消除旧怨的.

sentences.en: If I were you, I'd bury the hatchet.
sentences.cn: 如果我是你, 我就讲和.

sentences.en: Just bury the hatchet and go have a drink together!
sentences.cn: 别吵了,一起去喝一杯吧!

sentences.en: Like most little boys, he was extremely fond of the hatchet.
sentences.cn: 就像大多数小男孩一样, 他特别喜欢小斧头.

sentences.en: She went for him with a hatchet.
sentences.cn: 她操起短柄斧向他扑去.

sentences.en: The press did a very effective hatchet job on her last movie.
sentences.cn: 新闻界对她新近拍摄的电影大加诋毁。

sentences.en: The two countries decided to finally bury the hatchet.
They dug up the hatchet against the enemy this morning.
sentences.cn: 他们今早向敌人开战了.

sentences.en: They reckoned he was a hatchet man, out to shred the workforce and crush the union.
sentences.cn: 他们估计他是上司派来的刽子手，专门对工人大开杀戒，大肆镇压工会。

sentences.en: Two newspapers did avery effective hatchet job on the Prime Minister's achievements.
sentences.cn: 有两家报纸对首相的成就极尽诋毁之能事.

sentences.en: Will the time never come when we may honourably bury the hatchet?
sentences.cn: 难道我们永远不可能有个体面地休战的时候 吗 ?

sentences.en: Would I feel better if I took a hatchet to her, just to end this nightmare?
sentences.cn: 如果我向她举起一把短柄斧，结束这场噩梦，我会感觉好一些吗？

sentences.en: You will need a hatchet to do the job.
sentences.cn: 做这件事你得需要一把斧子。

trans.tran_en: a small axe with a short handle
